name: The Office (itch) (Chitra Ahuja)
description:
Story:

Michael Scott is the regional manager of the mid-sized paper supply company. He introduces Pam, who works as a receptionist and administrative assistant in the company. She introduces Howard Moe who is in the company for the inspection regarding the fax received.

Gameplay:

Travel to different places, discover hidden RDF data by talking with people, and answer questions by writing SPARQL queries that are executed over your created knowledge base.

You need your mouse and a keyboard to play this story. 

Prerequisite:

To play this story, you must download the RDF Training and Demonstration Framework (RDeF) and unpack the downloadable story in the "stories" folder of the RDeF directory. RDeF stories are short training sessions to practice your RDF and SPARQL skills. You must be able to read RDF data and be capable of writing SPARQL queries to enjoy RDeF stories as they do not teach the basics.
